Localization.Name: Sion "Scorched" Compensator2
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: ArmaMod
Type: Ballistic Compensator
Attachment Point: Barrel
Size: 2

Spread: -10%
Projectile Speed: -12.5%
Aim Recoil: -20%
Visual Recoil: -40%
Damage: -10%

Maintain accuracy by countering muzzle rise with the Sion Compensator2. ArmaMod's expertly designed S2 barrel attachment efficiently expels gasses to keep every shot on target. The Scorched edition features a unique flame patina.
